About the Company: Samtel India Ltd is the largest Indian integrated manufacturer of a wide range of display devices like Colour and B&W TV picture tubes, CRT glass electron guns, heaters and cathodes, deflection yokes and display monitors.The Product range of the company includes:19` Futurist Series,17` Multi Futurist Series,17` Futurist Series,15` Multi Futurist Series ,15` (WIZARD) Color Series,14` (INFINITY) Color Series and 14` SV630 Ultima Mono Series.
